channel.title: TravelgateX Documentation – Graphql Changelog
channel.description: Recent changes in Graphql Changelog on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Hotel-X: GraphQL Schema Changes
item.description:
The GraphQL HotelX schema change log is a list of recent and upcoming changes to our GraphQL API schema. It includes backwards-compatible changes, schema previews, and upcoming breaking changes. Check out this list of new releases and changes applied on the HotelX GraphQL API. Under construction! We have logged this resource on our roadmap and we are currently working through extending all of the resources in our documentation. If you need specific resources (such as this page), please let us know by using one of the following channels:
[...]

item.title: Travelgatex: GraphQL Schema Changes
item.description:
The GraphQL schema change log is a list of recent and upcoming changes to our GraphQL API schema. It includes backwards-compatible changes, schema previews, and upcoming breaking changes. Check out this list of new releases and changes applied on the TravelgateX GraphQL API. 2020-01-07 ✅ Input field country was added to input object type UpdateGroupInput ✅ Input field country was added to input object type CreateOrganizationInput ✅ Input field deletedAt_gte was added to input object type HotelXHotelFilterInput
[...]
